text:
Currently, an entry will be overwritten by another entry of the same day when assigning the same ID. 
Lenya should check if ID already exists for that day and ask user how to proceed (overwrite existing 
entry, assign another ID to new entry).
creator: hubertus@groepper.com
hubertus@groepper.com
text:
There is progress in 1.4-dev on this one. Instead of simply overwriting the
existing entry as it was orginally the case, an error message is shown
explaining the problem. It would be even better to provide an easy way to go
back to the "new entry" screen to change the id in question and maybe present a
less technical error screen to the user. Technically, this bug seems to be fixed.

This is the error without stacktrace:

The document [blog:authoring:/entries/2006/06/10/test/index:en] is already
contained in this publication!

org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: Error calling continuation at
file:/C:/Lenya/1-4/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/usecases/usecases.js:259:-1 at
<map:call> -
file:/C:/Lenya/1-4/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/usecases/usecase.xmap:97:39 at
<map:mount> - file:/C:/Lenya/1-4/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/usecase.xmap:56:128 at
<map:mount> - file:/C:/Lenya/1-4/build/lenya/webapp/global-sitemap.xmap:319:105
at <map:mount> - file:/C:/Lenya/1-4/build/lenya/webapp/sitemap.xmap:625:106

cause: org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.PublicationException: The document
[blog:authoring:/entries/2006/06/10/test/index:en] is already contained in this
publication!

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text: Blog module is no longer supported.
